member.name: M:Mtconnect.MakerBotAdapter.MakerBotRPCAdapter.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Double,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the MTConnect Adapter for MakerBot (Gen 5+) machine using the onboard JSON-RPC service.
member.param: Reference to the machine's serial number. Used as a lookup when discovering machines via broadcast discovery.
Copy of the authentication code used to connect the machine. You may need to use a separate application to obtain an Auth code.
The rate at which the adapter will poll the RPC service for more data.
